edu.brown.cs.systems.tracingplane.transit_layer

Interface TransitLayer<B extends Baggage>

  • Type Parameters:
    B - Some implementation of Baggage used by this transit layer.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AtomLayer<B>, BaggageLayer<B>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericBaggageLayer, NullTransitLayer, RawAtomLayer

    public interface TransitLayer<B extends Baggage>
    A TransitLayer provides implementations of methods that are called by users from the static methods in Baggage.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • isInstance

        boolean isInstance(Baggage baggage)
        Parameters:
        baggage - a baggage instance
        Returns:
        true if baggage is an instance of B or if baggage is null. This method only returns false if baggage is an instance of baggage but not an instance of B.

      • newInstance

        B newInstance()
        Returns:
        a new instance of B, which may be null to indicate an empty baggage

      • discard

        void discard(B baggage)
        Discards baggage. If this TransitLayer performs anything like reference counting, then this method is where decrementing reference counts would happen.
        Parameters:
        baggage - a baggage instance

      • branch

        B branch(B from)
        Create and return a copy of from. If this TransitLayer performs anything like reference counting, then this method might just return from while incrementing reference counts. This method might create a new instance of B and might even modify the contents of from
        Parameters:
        from - a baggage instance, possibly null
        Returns:
        a baggage instance branched from from, possibly null

      • join

        B join(B left,
       B right)
        Merge the contents of left and right and return as baggage. left and right should be treated as discarded (or reused) after this method call.
        Parameters:
        left - a baggage instance, possibly null
        right - a baggage instance, possibly null
        Returns:
        a baggage instance with merged contents from left and right

      • deserialize

        B deserialize(byte[] serialized,
              int offset,
              int length)
        Deserialize the provided serialized baggage representation.
        Parameters:
        serialized - a serialized baggage
        offset - offset into the array where the baggage bytes begin
        length - lenft of the baggage bytes
        Returns:
        a deserialized baggage instance, possibly null

      • readFrom

        B readFrom(java.io.InputStream in)
    throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a serialized baggage instance from the provided input stream. The serialized baggage instance should be length prefixed.
        Parameters:
        in - the input stream to read from
        Returns:
        a deserialized baggage instance, possibly null
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - propagated if any occurs while reading from in

      • serialize

        byte[] serialize(B baggage)
        Serialize the provided baggage instance to its byte representation. This method should behave as though branch(Baggage) is also being called prior to serialization.
        Parameters:
        baggage - a baggage instance to serialize, possibly null
        Returns:
        the serialized representation of baggage, which might be null or an empty byte array

      • serialize

        byte[] serialize(B baggage,
                 int maximumSerializedSize)
        Serialize the provided baggage instance to its byte representation and trim the baggage so that its serialized size is <= maximumSerializedSize. This method should behave as though branch(Baggage) is also being called prior to serialization.
        Parameters:
        baggage - a baggage instance to serialize, possibly null
        maximumSerializedSize - the maximum size in bytes of the serialized baggage.
        Returns:
        the serialized representation of baggage, which might be null or an empty byte array

      • writeTo

        void writeTo(java.io.OutputStream out,
             B baggage)
      throws java.io.IOException
        Serializes baggage and writes it length-prefixed to out.
        Parameters:
        out - the output stream to write to
        baggage - a baggage instance to serialize, possibly null
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - propagated if any occurs while writing to out

      • writeTo

        void writeTo(java.io.OutputStream out,
             B baggage,
             int maximumSerializedSize)
      throws java.io.IOException
        Serializes baggage and writes it length-prefixed to out. Also trims the baggage so that its serialized size is <= maximumSerializedSize
        Parameters:
        out - the output stream to write to
        baggage - a baggage instance to serialize, possibly null
        maximumSerializedSize - the maximum size in bytes of the serialized baggage.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - propagated if any occurs while writing to out
